text: puokke( bangobaaun you so hv) ban niyeay tha brasenbae ke ( poun yea min) ban luoch brakadchea bng robsa ke thleab luoch pimoun mk . haey you so hv ban leak touk rueng nih knong khluon robsa keat daoy keat minban bangheanh vea brab puokke laey . haey keat( you so hv)ban niyeay knong chetd tha puok anak pitchea akrak ryk men haey a l laoh doeng bamphot nouv avei del puok anak now reayreab
